mapper.select: select t.chargeItemName name,m.chargeItemId,t.unit,t.pinyin,t.price as priceMinPackage, IFNULL(m.valamt,0) chargeAmount, ROUND(IFNULL(m.valamt,0)* t.price,2) as shouldcost,'NO_FINISH' state,m.chargedType from tmp_charge_pay_temp m, bas_charge_item t where m.chargeItemId = t.chargeItemId and chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tmp_charge_pay_temp (chargePayTempId, valamt, chargeItemId, chargeMedTempId,chargedType,beid) values (#{chargePayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL}, #{chargeItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tmp_charge_pay_temp
chargePayTempId,
valamt,
chargeItemId,
chargeMedTempId,
chargedType,
beid,
#{chargePayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{valamt,jdbcType=REAL},
#{chargeItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tmp_charge_pay_temp
valamt = #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL},
chargeItemId = #{chargeItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chargedType = #{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where chargePayTempId = #{chargePayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tmp_charge_pay_temp set valamt = #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL}, chargeItemId = #{chargeItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chargedType = #{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where chargePayTempId = #{chargePayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
